body:
Hi Zack!


> void antimatter opening
> 1 grey_0.60
> 0
> 0


This will make the backface of your antimatter appear grey.


void antimatter opening
1 void
0
0


Will have invisible backside faces, I think this is what you want.


Cheers, Lars.
___
